msbt.message: <100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />各位乘客请注意， 本班机即将到达 。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="80" /> <100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />请把椅背调整到原来的位置， 系好安全带。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />本班机即将在水上降落。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />现在是当地时间时分， 天气晴， 气温还算正常。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />现在是当地时间时分， 天气阴， 气温还算正常。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />现在是当地时间时分， 天气雨， 气温还算正常。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />现在是当地时间时分， 天气雪， 气温还算正常。<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
